snippet: Brian McCann hit a grand slam, Tim Hudson tossed four-hit ball over seven innings and the Atlanta Braves beat host Philadelphia to spoil Ryan Howard’s season debut Friday night.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Atlanta Braves beat the Philadelphia Phillies, 5-0; other results and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brian McCann hit a grand slam, Tim Hudson tossed four-hit ball over seven innings and the Atlanta Braves beat host Philadelphia to spoil Ryan Howard’s season debut Friday night.

headline.seo: Braves Spoil Ryan Howard’s Season Debut for the Phillies
headline.main: Howard Back From Injury, but Phillies Lose to Braves
headline.print_headline: Howard Back From Injury, But Phillies Lose to Braves
